2064.subject: ESSP
2064.descrlong: Introduces ethical theory in a science and environmental policy context.  Students develop personal statements of ethics combining analysis with introspection.  Develops reading, writing, critical thinking, speaking, and listening skills.  Prerequisite: ESSP 211 or HCOM 211 or equivalent. (Offered spring semesters.)
